name: Gun Up
description:
Place your money to make the best weapon ever!

All you have to do is collecting money and deciding on weapon upgrade. Are you ready to build your dream gun?

What kind of weapon would you like to use? Is it fast or strong? The choice is yours. Get it and decide!
developers: Virtual Projects Oyun Yazilim Ve Teknoloji
publishers: Virtual Projects Oyun Yazilim Ve Teknoloji Limited Sirketi
